cupcakes.name: Rebel Red Velvet
cupcakes.description: Fluffy and moist, these buttery red velvet cupcakes are crowd favorite. The tangy cream cheese frosting puts them over the top!

cupcakes.name: Chocoholic
cupcakes.description: Super moist, pack tons of chocolate flavor! Topped with a rich chocolate buttercream, The real chocolate gives the frosting a fudge-y quality that makes it a chocolate loverâ€™s dream!

cupcakes.name: Vanilla Bean Fantasy
cupcakes.description: They are perfectly moist, completely irresistible cupcakes! These light and fluffy cupcakes are topped with creamy vanilla buttercream and topped with sprinkles for the ultimate sweet treat.

cupcakes.name: Strawberry Shortcupcake
cupcakes.description: Classic, biscuit-style shortcupcake. The cupcake is filled and layered with sweet juicy organic strawberries and whipped cream for a delicious treat!

cupcakes.name: Italian-ish Tiramisu
cupcakes.description: These cupcakes deliver all the flavor of the Italian dessert without the fuss. The vanilla cakes are soaked with coffee, topped with a rich amaretto-spiked mascarpone frosting, and dusted generously with cocoa powder for a simple, elegant finish.

cupcakes.name: Oreo Overload
cupcakes.description: These Oreo cupcakes will melt in your mouth and that cookies and cream frosting on top is nearly too good too be true. They're perfect for anything, especially just treating yourself!

cupcakes.name: Nutty Butter
cupcakes.description: These tender cupcakes are made with peanut butter in the batter and are topped with creamy peanut butter frosting and crushed peanuts. They have a double dose of peanut butter for the perfect peanut butter cupcake recipe.

cupcakes.name: Fudgiest Brownie
cupcakes.description: This brownie cupcakes recipe makes a cupcake that is fudgy and rich, just like brownies. They are topped with the silkiest white chocolate buttercream that literally melts in your mouth.

cupcakes.name: Carrot Cakey
cupcakes.description: Topped with cream cheese frosting. They're moist without being dense and have just the right amount of spice

cupcakes.name: Lemony Goody
cupcakes.description: These light and fluffy Lemon Cupcakes are made with a creamy lemon frosting for the best lemon cupcakes! They are easy to make and perfect for spring and summer or everyday!

cupcakes.name: Ice Ice Ice Cream
cupcakes.description: Ice Cream Cupcakes are the perfect birthday cupcake with your favorite chocolate cake and ice cream all in one single serving!

cupcakes.name: Cheesecake UnFactory
cupcakes.description: These Cheesecake Cupcakes have a smooth, creamy texture with a traditional buttery graham cracker crust topped with organic fresh raspberry.

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.review: The Chocoholic cupcake changed my life!!!!

reviews.name: CupcakeLover
reviews.review: Would give up everything for these cupcakes!
